title: I have a serious charge
text: This game is overall fun, but there is one thing that makes me angry. You have a very idiotic policy: that if you leave the game intentionally, you cannot join for another couple minutes. I think that you should be ashamed of yourself for making that because other games donâ€™t have that. I understand you donâ€™t want people leaving just because they werenâ€™t the impostor, but what if someone has to exit the game to do something other than sit here and play the game all day, which is pretty much what you assume, among us. If you do not fix the policy soon I will blow my stack and never play it, and along with that I will anti advertise it by telling everyone who plays it to either join me in my rebellion or stop playing.
